name: The Geography
description:
The Geography  is an endless, nonlinear orchestration.

The Geography is a companion for meditation, relaxation, jubilation, contemplation, self care, sleeping and dreaming.

The Geography is an endless album.

The Geography is both still and in motion.

The Geography is a passive game, but also lets you play, if you want to play.

The Geography uses terrain data from Svalbard, Norway rendered into low-poly landscapes brought to life with soft shaders. 

The Geography is inspired by The Global Seed Vault.

The Geography is inspired by Music.

The Geography is an electronic orchestration that plays forever, always re-organising itself, always changing and creating ambient sound baths. 

The Geography is unique to the listener, with every instance generating a unique organisation of harmonious sounds, creating a unique composition.

The Geography is a form of The New Music.

The Geography is a collaboration between Michael Berto and Titouan Millet.

----------------------

The Geography will be released for iOS, Android, Mac, PC and Linux
on September 13th 2021.
